availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David A. Bradshaw (Nicholas Co, Ky, farmer)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Mary Bradshaw. Married Fidelia H. Quiett Bradshaw in Nicholas County, Kentucky, on March 15, 1860. Stepfather of James Quiett, Franklin Quiett, John Quiett, Ana Quiett, and Ellen Quiett. Laborer in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Employed James Quiett in Nicholas County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 1, p. 454B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 1, p. 335.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County County Marriages, Film 000252410.
